items.sentence: We couldn\'t row against the strong current.
Tom has gone to Boston on official business.
Tom had enough time to do what he had to do.
I think doing that wouldn\'t be a good idea.
Mary isn\'t my girlfriend. She\'s my sister.
Tom couldn\'t come today because he\'s sick.
I need to know exactly what happened to Tom.
It\'s no secret that Tom doesn\'t like Mary.
The horse that won the race is owned by Tom.
The only person Tom knows in Boston is Mary.
The umbrella that I lent you belongs to Tom.
Has Tom decided where he\'ll go next summer?
I\'m sure Tom doesn\'t want to study French.
Tom answered the first question on the list.
I think we should ask Tom who told him that.
We\'ll never be able to get past the guards.
Tom isn\'t planning to come home for dinner.
Tom isn\'t very likely to get there on time.
Are you sure you don\'t want to come inside?
It was clear that Tom didn\'t want to leave.
